title: Microsoft's Halo 5 streaming event might reveal some non-Halo Xbox news
text:
Microsoft's Halo 5 streaming event might reveal some non-Halo Xbox news 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
Microsoft's Xbox One division has already announced plans to celebrate the launch of Halo 5: Guardians later today with a streaming event ca...
